SEARCH
Package com.xebisco.yield

Klasse AnimationPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.ComponentBehavior
com.xebisco.yield.AnimationPlayer
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Behavior, DefaultAxis, Disposable, Renderable
public final class AnimationPlayer extends ComponentBehavior
The AnimationPlayer class is a component behavior that handles the playing of animations by updating the texture rectangle with the current frame.

  • Feldübersicht

    Von Schnittstelle geerbte Felder com.xebisco.yield.DefaultAxis

    ACTION, BACK, FIRE, HORIZONTAL, HORIZONTAL_CAM, HORIZONTAL_PAD, INVENTORY, LEFT_BUMPER, LEFT_FIRE, LEFT_THUMB, RIGHT_BUMPER, RIGHT_FIRE, RIGHT_THUMB, RUN, START, VERTICAL, VERTICAL_CAM, VERTICAL_PAD, VIEW

    • getAnimation

      public Animation getAnimation()
      The function returns an Animation object.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning an object of type `Animation`.

    • setAnimation

      public void setAnimation(Animation animation)
      This function sets the animation and resets the frame and change counters.
      Parameter:
      animation - The animation object that is being set for the current object.

    • getToSwitchAnimation

      public Animation getToSwitchAnimation()
      The function returns the "toSwitchAnimation" object of type Animation.
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning an object of type `Animation`. The specific `Animation` object being returned is stored in the variable `toSwitchAnimation`.

    • setToSwitchAnimation

      public void setToSwitchAnimation(Animation toSwitchAnimation)
      This function sets the value of a variable called "toSwitchAnimation" to the value of the input parameter "toSwitchAnimation".
      Parameter:
      toSwitchAnimation - The parameter "toSwitchAnimation" is an object of the class "Animation". This method sets the value of the instance variable "toSwitchAnimation" to the value passed as the parameter, which is the next animation that is going to be played by this `AnimationPlayer` object.

    • getActualFrame

      public int getActualFrame()
      The function returns the value of the variable "actualFrame".
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning the value of the variable "actualFrame".

    • setActualFrame

      public void setActualFrame(int actualFrame)
      This function sets the value of the "actualFrame" variable.
      Parameter:
      actualFrame - actualFrame is a variable of type int that represents the current frame of an animation. The method setActualFrame is a setter method that sets the value of actualFrame to the value passed as a parameter.

    • getToChange

      public double getToChange()
      The function returns the value of a double variable named "toChange".
      Gibt zurück:
      The method is returning a double value named "toChange".

    • setToChange

      public void setToChange(double toChange)
      This function sets the value of a variable named "toChange".
      Parameter:
      toChange - toChange is a variable of type double that is being set using the setter method.
